name: traShark
description:
In "Trashark", you take the role of a pistol shrimp that tries to save the wildlife of an extremely polluted ocean. But there's something even more dangerous, lurking in the murky waters…

- Help fish in distress and receive their help.

- Fight the final boss - The Trashark - and save your homeland from impending doom.

This game was made for the #SEAJAM, learn more at:

https://itch.io/jam/seajam

Credits:

https://github.com/BurgundyDev/trashark/releases/tag/v1.0
